question: Which sea houses the active submarine volcano "Kick 'em Jenny"?
explanation: Kick 'em Jenny is an active submarine volcano or seamount on the Caribbean Sea floor, located north of the island of Grenada and west of Ronde Island in the Grenadines. Kick-'em-Jenny rises 1,300 m above the seafloor on the steep inner western slope of the Lesser Antilles ridge. The South American tectonic plate is subducting the Caribbean tectonic plate to the east of this ridge and under the Lesser Antilles island arc.
